views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

This package based "TapTapFolder" by @QusicS.

Make the first icon of the folder a folder image.

You can launch the first application of the folder with 3D touch.
(For devices without 3D touch, you can use double tap)

- Settings -

Reversed Behavior:
When enabled, single tap to open folder while double tap to open the first app.

Keep Folder Preview:
When enabled, folder icons won't be modified. Respring is required for this change to take effect.

Display to Folder as Icon:
When enabled, make the first icon of the folder a folder image. Respring is required for this change to take effect.

Use 3D Touch:
When enabled on supported devices, you can use a deep press to trigger the double tap action.

Double Tap Timeout:
You can change the timing when double tap is used.
(The default is 0.2 seconds)

Hide Folders Icons:
When enabled, Delete the icon in the folders on the home screen. Respring is required for this change to take effect.

Hide Folders Icons BG view:
When enabled, Delete the blurred portion of the folder icon. Respring is required for this change to take effect.

Hide Folders BG view:
When enabled, Delete the blur in the folder.

Hide Folders Titles:
When enabled, Hide the title when the folder is open.

4x4 Folders:
When enabled, Set the number of apps in the folder to 4x4 (iPhone and iPod only) Respring is required for this change to take effect.

Tap to Close:
When enabled, Close the folder with tap the screen.

Hide Icon Tap Shadow:
When enabled, Delete the shadow when tapping the icon.

No Folder Animations:
When enabled, Eliminate Folders animation.

Configure options from Settings app.

v0.0.6 Support for A12(X) arm64e devices Add: Auto Close Folder iPhone XS Max / XR is not fully supported yet. v0.0.5
Added:
- Hide Folders Icons
- Hide Folders Icons BG view
- Hide Folders BG view
- Hide Folders Titles
- 4x4 Folders
- Tap to Close
- Hide Icon Tap Shadow
- No Folder Animations

Conflicts: betterFourByFourFolders, Folder6Plus
